theDuelist:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theDuelist:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [R] times. NL (Deal !ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theDuelist:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theDuelist:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theDuelist:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theDuelist:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to ALL enemies, 2 times.
theDuelist:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to ALL enemies, 3 times.

theDuelist:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theDuelist:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theDuelist:AlphaMagnet.NAME: A. Magnet Warrior
theDuelist:AlphaMagnet.DESCRIPTION: Summon 1. Gain Alpha Magnet. Deal 5 damage.

theDuelist:AxeDespair.NAME: Axe of Despair
theDuelist:AxeDespair.DESCRIPTION: Gain 10 strength this turn. At the end of the turn, Sacrifice 1 and place this card on top of your draw pile.

theDuelist:BadReaction.NAME: Bad Reaction
theDuelist:BadReaction.DESCRIPTION: During your turn, any healing effects damage all enemies instead.

theDuelist:BarrelDragon.NAME: Barrel Dragon
theDuelist:BarrelDragon.DESCRIPTION: Tribute 2. Deal 10 damage. Apply 3 random debuffs to 3 random enemies.

theDuelist:BlueEyesToon.NAME: B.E. Toon Dragon
theDuelist:BlueEyesToon.DESCRIPTION: Tribute 2. Deal 25 damage (through block). Can only be played if Toon World is active.

theDuelist:BusterBlader.NAME: Buster Blader
theDuelist:BusterBlader.DESCRIPTION: Tribute 2. Deal 25 damage. Add 5 damage for each enemy in combat.

theDuelist:CannonSoldier.NAME: Cannon Soldier
theDuelist:CannonSoldier.DESCRIPTION: Once per turn, remove 1 summon and deal 5 damage to ALL enemies.

theDuelist:CardDestruction.NAME: Card Destruction
theDuelist:CardDestruction.DESCRIPTION: Discard your entire hand. Gain 1 Intangible. Gain 1 block for each enemy in combat. Gain 1 artifact for each enemy in combat.

theDuelist:CastleDarkIllusions.NAME: Castle Dark Illusion
theDuelist:CastleDarkIllusions.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you shuffle your discard pile back into your deck, Summon 1 for each monster card shuffled.

theDuelist:CatapultTurtle.NAME: Catapult Turtle
theDuelist:CatapultTurtle.DESCRIPTION: Once per turn, remove all summons and deal 10 damage for each to ALL enemies.

theDuelist:DarkHole.NAME: Dark Hole
theDuelist:DarkHole.DESCRIPTION: Destroy ALL minions in combat. Remove all your buffs. Exhaust.

theDuelist:DarklordMarie.NAME: Darklord Marie
theDuelist:DarklordMarie.DESCRIPTION: Summon 1 monster. Deal 4 damage. Overflow 10 - gain 2 HP.

theDuelist:DarkMagician.NAME: Dark Magician
theDuelist:DarkMagician.DESCRIPTION: Tribute 2.  Deal 25 damage. Apply 3 Spell Counters.

theDuelist:ExodiaHead.NAME: Exodia Head
theDuelist:ExodiaHead.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Exodia. Summon 1 monster. Overflow - Apply 1 Exodia. Exhaust.

theDuelist:ExodiaLA.NAME: Exodia L. Arm
theDuelist:ExodiaLA.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Exodia. Summon 1 monster. Overflow - Apply 1 Exodia. Exhaust.

theDuelist:ExodiaLL.NAME: Exodia L. Leg
theDuelist:ExodiaLL.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Exodia. Summon 1 monster. Overflow - Apply 1 Exodia. Exhaust.

theDuelist:ExodiaRA.NAME: Exodia R. Arm
theDuelist:ExodiaRA.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Exodia. Summon 1 monster. Overflow - Apply 1 Exodia. Exhaust.

theDuelist:ExodiaRL.NAME: Exodia R. Leg
theDuelist:ExodiaRL.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Exodia. Summon 1 monster. Overflow - Apply 1 Exodia. Exhaust.

theDuelist:FeatherPho.NAME: Phoenix Feather
theDuelist:FeatherPho.DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 card from your hand. Place 1 card from your discard pile into your draw pile.

theDuelist:FiendMegacyber.NAME: Fiend Megacyber
theDuelist:FiendMegacyber.DESCRIPTION: Tribute 1. Deal 5 damage to any enemy for every Spell Counter it has.

theDuelist:Fissure.NAME: Fissure
theDuelist:Fissure.DESCRIPTION: Deal 12 damage to the enemy with the lowest HP.

theDuelist:FlameSwordsman.NAME: Flame Swordsman
theDuelist:FlameSwordsman.DESCRIPTION: Tribute 1. Apply Burning Flesh. Deal 6 damage.

theDuelist:GammaMagnet.NAME: G. Magnet Warrior
theDuelist:GammaMagnet.DESCRIPTION: Summon 1. Gain Gamma Magnet. Draw 1 card.

theDuelist:GateGuardian.NAME: Gate Guardian
theDuelist:GateGuardian.DESCRIPTION: Tribute 2. Can only be played if you have a lightning, plasma and frost channeled. Summon 3. Deal 50 damage.

theDuelist:GiantTrunade.NAME: Giant Trunade
theDuelist:GiantTrunade.DESCRIPTION: Remove all buffs and debuffs from everyone in combat. Reapply all buffs and debuffs at the start of your next turn.

theDuelist:GracefulCharity.NAME: Graceful Charity
theDuelist:GracefulCharity.DESCRIPTION: Draw 3 cards. At the end of your turn, discard 2 cards.

theDuelist:HarpieFeather.NAME: Harpie Feather Duster
theDuelist:HarpieFeather.DESCRIPTION: Remove all buffs from all enemies.

theDuelist:ImperialOrder.NAME: Imperial Order
theDuelist:ImperialOrder.DESCRIPTION: Negate all enemy buffs and debuffs. At the start of each turn, choose to take 7 damage or remove this effect.

theDuelist:InjectionFairy.NAME: Injection Fairy Lily
theDuelist:InjectionFairy.DESCRIPTION: Summon 1 monster. Choose one: take 5 damage and deal 15 damage; gain 15 HP and deal 5 damage.

theDuelist:InsectQueen.NAME: Insect Queen
theDuelist:InsectQueen.DESCRIPTION: Tribute all summons. Apply that much poison to all enemies.

theDuelist:JamBreeding.NAME: Jam Breed Machine
theDuelist:JamBreeding.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Summon 1 and deal 5 damage to a random enemy.

theDuelist:LegendaryFisherman.NAME: Legendary Fisherman
theDuelist:LegendaryFisherman.DESCRIPTION: Tribute 3. Apply Mako's Tsunami to all enemies. Exhaust.

theDuelist:MagicCylinder.NAME: Magic Cylinder
theDuelist:MagicCylinder.DESCRIPTION: The next time you take unblocked damage, gain Reflection.

theDuelist:Mausoleum.NAME: Emperor Mausoleum
theDuelist:Mausoleum.DESCRIPTION: The first card you play with Tribute each turn does not sacrifice. Take 1 damage each turn.

theDuelist:MonsterReborn.NAME: Monster Reborn
theDuelist:MonsterReborn.DESCRIPTION: Play a monster card from your discard pile. Exhaust.

theDuelist:NutrientZ.NAME: Nutrient Z
theDuelist:NutrientZ.DESCRIPTION: If an enemy attacks you for 20+ damage, heal for 40 HP before taking damage.

theDuelist:ObeliskTormentor.NAME: Obelisk
theDuelist:ObeliskTormentor.DESCRIPTION: Tribute 4. Each time you sacrifice a monster, deal 6 damage to ALL enemies.

theDuelist:OjamaBlack.NAME: Ojama Black
theDuelist:OjamaBlack.DESCRIPTION: Summon 1. Apply 10 Spell Counter. Gain Black Ojama Token

theDuelist:Ojamagic.NAME: Ojamagic
theDuelist:Ojamagic.DESCRIPTION: Apply a random number (0-10) of Spell Counters to each enemy. Exhaust.

theDuelist:OjamaGreen.NAME: Ojama Green
theDuelist:OjamaGreen.DESCRIPTION: Summon 1. Apply 5 Spell Counter. Gain Green Ojama Token.

theDuelist:OjamaKing.NAME: Ojama King
theDuelist:OjamaKing.DESCRIPTION: Tribute 3. Apply an effect X times for each different Ojama token you have to every enemy with Spell Counters, where X is the number of Spell Counters.

theDuelist:OjamaKnight.NAME: Ojama Knight
theDuelist:OjamaKnight.DESCRIPTION: Tribute 1. Gain a random Ojama Token.

theDuelist:OjamaYellow.NAME: Ojama Yellow
theDuelist:OjamaYellow.DESCRIPTION: Summon 1. Apply 1 Spell Counter. Gain Yellow Ojama Token

theDuelist:Parasite.NAME: Parasite Paracide
theDuelist:Parasite.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, have a chance to poison or debuff random enemies. Chances are raised with more summon stacks.

theDuelist:PotAvarice.NAME: Pot of Avarice
theDuelist:PotAvarice.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 5 monster cards from your discard pile into your deck. Draw 2 cards. Exhaust.

theDuelist:PotDuality.NAME: Pot of Duality
theDuelist:PotDuality.DESCRIPTION: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck - add one to your hand and shuffle the other two back in.

theDuelist:PotGenerosity.NAME: Pot of Generosity
theDuelist:PotGenerosity.DESCRIPTION: Each time you Summon this turn, gain 1 mana.

theDuelist:Pumpking.NAME: Pumpking
theDuelist:Pumpking.DESCRIPTION: Tribute 1. Play a random monster card from your discard pile.

theDuelist:Pumprincess.NAME: Pumprincess
theDuelist:Pumprincess.DESCRIPTION: Summon 1. Play a random monster from your discard pile.

theDuelist:RadiantMirrorForce.NAME: Radiant Mirror Force
theDuelist:RadiantMirrorForce.DESCRIPTION: The next time you take unblocked damage, all enemies lose all block.

theDuelist:RainMercy.NAME: Rain of Mercy
theDuelist:RainMercy.DESCRIPTION: Heal 15 HP and heal ALL enemies for 20 HP.

theDuelist:Relinquished.NAME: Relinquished
theDuelist:Relinquished.DESCRIPTION: Tribute 2. Copy each enemy action this turn.

theDuelist:SliferSky.NAME: Slifer Sky Dragon
theDuelist:SliferSky.DESCRIPTION: Tribute 4. At the start of your turn, sacrifice all monsters and apply 1 Blessing of Ra for each. Exhaust.

theDuelist:SwordsBurning.NAME: Swords: Burning Light
theDuelist:SwordsBurning.DESCRIPTION: Each time you deal 10 unblocked damage for the next 3 turns, Summon 1.

theDuelist:SwordsConcealing.NAME: Swords: Concealing Light
theDuelist:SwordsConcealing.DESCRIPTION: For the next 3 turns, gain 15 block at the start of your turn.

theDuelist:SwordsRevealing.NAME: Swords: Revealing Light
theDuelist:SwordsRevealing.DESCRIPTION: For the next 3 turns, gain 1 Intangible. You may not play any attack cards while this effect is active.

theDuelist:TimeWizard.NAME: Time Wizard
theDuelist:TimeWizard.DESCRIPTION: Once per turn, either ALL enemies receive 1 Spell Counter or you receive 1 vulnerable. Chosen randomly.

theDuelist:ToonWorld.NAME: Toon World
theDuelist:ToonWorld.DESCRIPTION: Allows you to play Toon monster cards.

theDuelist:TrapHole.NAME: Trap Hole
theDuelist:TrapHole.DESCRIPTION: The next time an enemy summons minions, deal 10 damage to ALL enemies.

theDuelist:ValkMagnet.NAME: Valkyrion
theDuelist:ValkMagnet.DESCRIPTION: If you have all three magnets, summon 3 and deal 20 damage. Remove all magnets.

theDuelist:DarkMirrorForce.NAME: Dark Mirror Force
theDuelist:DarkMirrorForce.DESCRIPTION: The next time you take damage, gain Weak equal to the damage and take 0 damage.

theDuelist:StormingMirrorForce.NAME: Storming Mirror Force
theDuelist:StormingMirrorForce.DESCRIPTION: Each time an enemy attacks this turn, Summon 1.

theDuelist:ToonBarrelDragon.NAME: Toon Barrel Dragon
theDuelist:ToonBarrelDragon.DESCRIPTION: Tribute 2. Deal a random amount of damage (0-50) to each enemy. Can only be played if Toon World is active.

theDuelist:ToonBriefcase.NAME: Toon Briefcase
theDuelist:ToonBriefcase.DESCRIPTION: Toon monsters played this turn are added back to your hand at the end of your turn.

theDuelist:ToonDarkMagician.NAME: Toon Dark Magician
theDuelist:ToonDarkMagician.DESCRIPTION: Tribute 2. Deal 15 damage (through block). Apply 3 Spell Counters. Can only be played if Toon World is active.

theDuelist:ToonDarkMagicianGirl.NAME: Toon D.M. Girl
theDuelist:ToonDarkMagicianGirl.DESCRIPTION: Summon 1. Apply 6 Spell Counters. Can only be played if Toon World is active.

theDuelist:ToonGeminiElf.NAME: Toon Gemini Elf
theDuelist:ToonGeminiElf.DESCRIPTION: Summon 2. Deal 3 damage (through block). Can only be played if Toon World is active.

theDuelist:ToonMermaid.NAME: Toon Mermaid
theDuelist:ToonMermaid.DESCRIPTION: Summon 1. Deal 6 damage (through block). Can only be played if Toon World is active.

theDuelist:ToonSummonedSkull.NAME: Toon S. Skull
theDuelist:ToonSummonedSkull.DESCRIPTION: Tribute 1. Deal 9 damage (through block). Gain 1 Strength. Can only be played if Toon World is active.

theDuelist:WingedDragonRa.NAME: Winged Dragon Ra
theDuelist:WingedDragonRa.DESCRIPTION: Tribute 4. Deal damage equal to (number of cards played this turn + summons) multiplied by X.
